message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $95. I believe it's a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I'm only willing to pay up to $85 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to my initial asking price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still not able to go above $87 for the product. Let me know if this is within your range.
